ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for Captain Seat Type)

atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the parts may injure your hands.

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the RH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER LOWER ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the reclining adjuster lower arm sub-assembly LH to the rear seat inner track assembly RH with the 3 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER LOWER ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Apply MP grease to the locations of the seat track adjusting handle shown in the illustration.
Apply MP grease to the locations of the rear seat outer track assembly RH and rear seat inner track assembly RH shown in the illustration.
Attach the 2 springs to install the seat track adjusting handle to the rear seat outer track assembly RH and rear seat inner track assembly RH.

atten4.ptxt: The seat track adjusting handle will get caught on the springs when installing it. Detach the springs to install the seat track adjusting handle.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION FRAME SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the No. 1 seat cushion frame sub-assembly RH with the 4 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT CUSHION EDGE PROTECTOR RH

s2.ptxt: Install the rear seat cushion edge protector RH to the reclining adjuster lower arm sub-assembly RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION COVER

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, install the rear No. 1 seat cushion cover to the rear No. 1 seat cushion pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT CUSHION COVER WITH PAD

s2.ptxt: Set the seat cushion cover with pad in place.
Using hog ring pliers, install the seat cushion cover with pad to the rear No. 1 seat cushion frame with new hog rings.

entry.ptxt: Rear No. 1 Seat Cushion Cover Lower Part

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Return the lower part of the rear No. 1 seat cushion cover to its original position, and then, using hog ring pliers, install new hog rings.
Attach the hook.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT CUSHION EDGE PROTECTOR

s2.ptxt: Install the 2 cushion edge protectors to the 2 cushion edge tabs.
Return the 2 cushion edge tabs to their original positions.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to break the cushion edge tabs.

s2.ptxt: Install the No. 1 seatback pad RH to the rear No. 1 seatback frame.
Using hog ring pliers, attach the 2 straps of the rear No. 1 seatback cover to the No. 1 seatback pad RH with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to install the 2 headrest supports.
Using hog ring pliers, install the upper part of the rear No. 1 seatback cover to the rear No. 1 seatback frame with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, install the center of the rear No. 1 seatback cover to the No. 1 seatback pad with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 hooks.
Pass the 2 straps of the rear No. 1 seatback cover through the 2 holes of the No. 1 seatback pad RH to the backside.
Using hog ring pliers, attach the 2 straps of the rear No. 1 seatback cover to the rear No. 1 seatback frame with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Using hog ring pliers, attach the 2 wires at the bottom of the rear No. 1 seatback cover with new hog rings.

item.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the cover.
When installing the hog rings, avoid wrinkling the cover.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 hooks.
Install the rear No. 1 seatback assembly to the rear No. 1 seat cushion assembly with the 4 bolts.
Using needle nose pliers, install the seatback spring.
Install the center seat hinge spacer to the rear seat armrest assembly RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT ARMREST ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the rear seat armrest assembly, No. 1 armrest plate and armrest lock plate with the bolt.
Attach the fastener to close the rear seat armrest cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT CUSHION SHIELD RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw, and then attach the rear part of the rear seat cushion shield RH in the order shown in the illustration to install the rear seat cushion shield RH.
Install the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw to install the reclining adjuster release handle RH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Install the rear No. 1 seat inner belt assembly RH with the nut.

atten3.ptxt: Do not allow the anchor part of the seat belt to overlap the protruding part of the seat.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR SEAT INNER CUSHION SHIELD RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the claw, and then attach the rear part of the rear seat inner cushion shield RH in the order shown in the illustration to install the rear seat inner cushion shield RH.
Install the 2 screws.
Install the rear seat headrest assembly.
